Only at lv 18, and the item only gives 30 Armor and 50 MR with no aura, with items with Knights Vow being implemented and CotC? The item is a joke compared to the other support tank items in the game.

*60 MR. 

Which is pretty significant, since Knight's Vow has 0 MR and only gives more Armor than Locket if you're near your partner. CotC is very self-focused, Knight's Vow is focused around protecting one person, but Locket is focused on team fights. It is much more impactful for the entire team, especially late game, than Knight's Vow or CotC are.

Basically, those three things serve three different play-styles - Knight's Vow for Warden play-styles (you have to stick close to your adc and protect them), CotC for Vanguard play-styles (initiating fights in the middle of the enemy), and Locket for people who play in-between - they focus on protecting the entire team in fights, not just one person, and may or may not initiate.

Not every ap support can easily use the ones that augment healing/shielding so those ones really only have zekes and fqc.

The AP supports who don't want to use Censer/Athenes can just go for a real AP item like Mid. I'm assuming you're talking about the likes of Morgana, Zyra, etc.?

And honestly, my initial comment was half a joke, but there isn't more than 4-5 options for most kind of items...

You want Armor as a Tank? Randuin/Sunfire/Deadman/Thornmail/FrozenHeart
You want MR as a Tank? Spirit/Banshee/Solari/ZZrot
You want AS+Crit? The 4 Zeal upgrades
You want lifesteal as an ADC? Bloodthirster/Mercurial/BotRK/Death's Dance
You want a semi-offensive item with some HP? The 3 Jaurim upgrades or Black Cleaver
You want Lethality and high AD? The 3 Dirk upgrades.
You want AD and CDR? Cleaver/Maw/Death's Dance/Youmuu

Whatever kind of item you want, you pretty much never have more than 4 or 5 choices.
